Title: Save My Love
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Graham Yost, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole"), Benjamin Cavell (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: After Winona realizes that Raylan didn't recover her counterfeit $100 bill from the bank robbery, she drops another bombshell on him. Meanwhile, the coal mine offers Boyd a new job more suited toward his skills.
